_metadata.description: Composite end-to-end user flow requirements that validate complete feature journeys

requirements.prd_ref: Complete User Journeys > New User Onboarding
requirements.title: New user can complete full workflow creation and execution journey
requirements.description: Validates the complete new user experience from landing on dashboard through creating a project, building a workflow manually, executing it, and viewing execution results with replay. This is the primary marketing demo flow and represents the core value proposition of browser-automation-studio.

validation.notes: 41-step workflow covering: project creation → workflow building → node configuration → execution → history viewing → replay. Skips AI generation for deterministic testing.

requirements.prd_ref: Complete User Journeys > AI-Assisted Workflow Creation
requirements.title: New user can create workflow using AI generation
requirements.description: Validates the AI-assisted workflow creation path: Create project → Use AI prompt to generate workflow → Review generated workflow → Execute → View results
requirements.notes: Automation playbook still pending (planned location: bas/flows/happy-path-ai-generation.json)

requirements.prd_ref: Complete User Journeys > Debug Failed Workflow
requirements.title: User can debug and fix a failed workflow execution
requirements.description: Validates debugging workflow: Execute workflow with failing assertion → View execution details → Identify failure point → Edit workflow → Re-execute → Verify success

requirements.prd_ref: Complete User Journeys > Edit Existing Workflow
requirements.title: User can edit and re-run existing workflow
requirements.description: Validates workflow editing: Open existing workflow → Add/modify nodes → Create/modify connections → Save changes → Execute updated workflow → Compare execution results

requirements.prd_ref: Complete User Journeys > Version History Recovery
requirements.title: User can view version history and restore previous version
requirements.description: Validates version control workflow: Make changes to workflow → View version history → Compare versions → Restore previous version → Verify restoration
